a.n: The Dog Rescuers With Alan Davies X (6)

p.k: In the West Midlands, Inspector Herchy Boal receives an anonymous call about a labradoodle who is reportedly underweight, with infected ears and dirty matted fur. It's up to Herchy to get to the bottom of this reported neglect. On the banks of the River Thames in Putney is one of the busiest animal hospitals in the UK.
